HomePage.title: LifeSync · Holistic Health
HomePage.typeText: Focusing on mind-body health, empowering personalized management with data and emotional support.%Integrating community, AI assistant, and multi-device sync for comprehensive health management.%Positive reinforcement helps build lasting healthy habits.%Data-driven insights + emotional support make health management less lonely.%Your personal health advisor, providing professional guidance anytime.

features.title: Holistic Health Management Features
features.subtitle: Our platform provides comprehensive health management functions to help you achieve coordinated development of physical and mental health.

physicalHealth.title: Physical Health Monitoring
physicalHealth.description: Comprehensively record and analyze your physical health data, including multi-dimensional information such as exercise, sleep, and diet.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health Assessment
mentalHealth.description: Through scientific psychological evaluation tools, help you understand your mental state and adjust your mental health in a timely manner.

emotionManagement.title: Emotion Management
emotionManagement.description: Record emotional changes, provide emotional regulation methods, and help you maintain a positive and optimistic attitude.

healthRisk.title: Health Risk Warning
healthRisk.description: Based on your health data, predict potential health risks and provide personalized health advice.

aiAssistant.title: AI Health Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Intelligent AI assistant provides 24-hour health consultation services, answering health questions and providing professional advice.

multiDevice.title: Multi-device Data Synchronization
multiDevice.description: Support data synchronization of various health devices, integrate various health data, and provide a comprehensive health view.

cta.title: Begin Your Holistic Health Journey
cta.description: Join us and experience a new way of coordinated physical and mental health management, making health management simple and effective.
